name: Maestro Labs Notetaker Enterprise
summary_and_recommendation: TeamsMaestro presents MEDIUM RISK (42/100) with good data protection practices but gaps in enterprise controls and documentation. Key concerns include limited admin management capabilities, basic audit features, and incomplete public documentation. Recommendation: APPROVE with enhanced monitoring and enterprise controls implementation.
primary_use_case: Meeting transcription and AI-powered note-taking for Microsoft Teams
assessment_notes: Assessment based on public privacy policy and security documentation. Limited enterprise-specific documentation available. Vendor claims SOC 2 Type II certification but details not publicly verified.

recommendations.title: Implement Enterprise Controls
recommendations.description: Work with vendor to establish enterprise admin dashboard and centralized user management

recommendations.title: Enhanced Documentation Request
recommendations.description: Request security questionnaire, DPA, and SOC 2 Type II certification details

recommendations.title: Audit Trail Implementation
recommendations.description: Ensure comprehensive logging of all meeting recordings and data access

detailed_assessment.summary_and_recommendation: TeamsMaestro presents MEDIUM RISK (42/100) with good data protection practices but gaps in enterprise controls and documentation. Key concerns include limited admin management capabilities, basic audit features, and incomplete public documentation. Recommendation: APPROVE with enhanced monitoring and enterprise controls implementation.

geographic_control.justification: Known secure regions (US, EU) with contracts - Privacy policy states 'personal information is stored in one or more databases hosted by third parties located in the United States and the European Union' with Standard Contractual Clauses for international transfers.

encryption_standards.justification: Enterprise-Grade Encryption - AES-256 encryption at rest and in transit + vendor-managed keys + published encryption specifications - Security documentation states 'Data is encrypted at rest and in transit' with comprehensive encryption practices.

data_retention.justification: Clear Limited Retention - Specific retention periods documented (â‰¤90 days) + automatic deletion procedures + user deletion controls - Privacy policy states 'retention periods vary depending on the type of data' with 'zero-day retention available to enterprise customers' and data deletion upon verified request.

model_training.justification: Contractual guarantee of no training use - Security documentation explicitly states 'We only collect the data needed to deliver our services and it is never used to train AI models' providing clear contractual protection.

data_sharing.justification: Broad sharing or unclear sharing practices - Privacy policy states data is 'shared with trusted third-party service providers' and 'share email content and user instructions with third-party AI models' with limited clarity on specific third parties.

admin_management.justification: Limited Controls - User visibility only + minimal management capabilities - Documentation not found for enterprise admin dashboard, centralized user management, or role-based permissions. Standard penalty applied.

audit_capabilities.justification: Basic Auditing - Limited logs + manual export only + basic usage statistics - Privacy policy mentions data processing for 'troubleshooting issues' but no detailed audit logging capabilities documented.

integration.justification: Limited Integration - SSO only + no provisioning + minimal enterprise features - Product integrates with Microsoft Teams but limited documentation on enterprise identity management features.

regulatory_violations.justification: Mostly Compliant - Basic compliance certifications + privacy policy compliant with major regulations + some gaps in specialized requirements - Privacy policy shows GDPR compliance, mentions SOC 2 Type II certification, but lacks detailed third-party verification.

data_processing_transparency.justification: Basic Transparency - General data processing description + retention periods stated + some third-party relationships disclosed - Privacy policy provides general processing descriptions and mentions third-party AI models but lacks detailed data flow diagrams.

documentation_and_support.justification: Adequate Documentation - Standard privacy policy + limited security information + support available but slower response times - Comprehensive privacy policy available, basic security page, but Trust Center was inaccessible and limited detailed security documentation publicly available.
